images.caption: Figure 1.Combined score over evolution steps for two seed programs. The combined score is the optimization target, defined as0.8×Avg Recall@100+0.2×Avg nDCG@100.8\times\text{Avg Recall@100}+0.2\times\text{Avg nDCG@10}, averaged across 12 IR datasets222BEIR: ArguAna, FiQA, NFCorpus, SciFact, SciDocs, TREC-COVID. BRIGHT: Biology, Earth Science, Economics, Pony, StackOverflow, TheoremQA..

Figure 2.Evolution trajectories for the BM25 seed (left) and Dirichlet seed (right). Recall@100 improves nearly monotonically in both runs, while nDCG@10 occasionally regresses at the same steps, reflecting deliberate trades made by the evolutionary process to maximize the optimization target.
